General.Name: Shenzhen Sosen Electronics Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen Sosen Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells medium and high-power LED driver power products. Its products are used in plants, outdoor, industrial, landscape, and smart lightings. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

1.Name: Ms. Xiaoqin  Jiang
1.Title: CFO & Sec. of the Board of Directors

4.Title: Chairman of the Supervisory Board and Head of Mass Production Maintenance of R&D Department
